query.formula: A[] ( !( (belt6[1] == 1) and (belt6[2] == 1) and (belt6[3] == 1) and (belt6[4] == 1) and (belt6[5] == 1) and (belt6[6] == 1) and (belt6[7] == 1) and (belt6[8] == 1) and (belt6[9] == 1) and (belt6[10] == 1) and (belt6[11] == 1) and (belt6[12] == 1) and (belt6[13] == 1) ) and !( (belt7[1] == 1) and (belt7[2] == 1) and (belt7[3] == 1) and (belt7[4] == 1) and (belt7[5] == 1) and (belt7[6] == 1) and (belt7[7] == 1) and (belt7[8] == 1) and (belt7[9] == 1) and (belt7[10] == 1) and (belt7[11] == 1) and (belt7[12] == 1) ) and !( (belt8[0] == 1) and (belt8[1] == 1) and (belt8[2] == 1) and (belt8[3] == 1) and (belt8[4] == 1) and (belt8[5] == 1) and (belt8[6] == 1) and (belt8[7] == 1) and (belt8[8] == 1) and (belt8[9] == 1) and (belt8[10] == 1) ) and !( (belt5[1] == 1) and (belt5[2] == 1) and (belt5[3] == 1) and (belt5[4] == 1) ) and !( (belt3[0] == 1) and (belt3[1] == 1) and (belt3[2] == 1) and (belt3[3] == 1) and (belt3[4] == 1) ) )

Scenario 3: No queue ever exceeds the maximum allowed length.

query.formula: A[] not deadlock
query.comment: The plant never incurs in deadlock.
The production plant never has duplicate or missing pieces (12 pieces):

query.formula: A[] ( (!conveyorBelt1.DOING_STEP and !conveyorBelt2.DOING_STEP and !conveyorBelt3.DOING_STEP and !conveyorBelt4.DOING_STEP and !conveyorBelt5.DOING_STEP and !conveyorBelt6.DOING_STEP and !conveyorBelt7.DOING_STEP and !conveyorBelt8.DOING_STEP) imply (belt6[0] + belt6[1] + belt6[2] + belt6[3] + belt6[4] + belt6[5] + belt6[6] + belt6[7] + belt6[8] + belt6[9] + belt6[10] + belt6[11] + belt6[12] + belt6[13] + belt6[14] + belt6[15] + belt6[16] + belt1[0] + belt1[1] + belt1[2] + belt1[3] + belt1[4] + belt1[5] + belt7[0] + belt7[1] + belt7[2] + belt7[3] + belt7[4] + belt7[5] + belt7[6] + belt7[7] + belt7[8] + belt7[9] + belt7[10] + belt7[11] + belt7[12] + belt7[13] + belt7[14] + belt2[0] + belt2[1] + belt2[2] + belt2[3] + belt2[4] + belt2[5] + belt8[0] + belt8[1] + belt8[2] + belt8[3] + belt8[4] + belt8[5] + belt8[6] + belt8[7] + belt8[8] + belt8[9] + belt8[10] + belt8[11] + belt8[12] + belt8[13] + belt8[14] + belt8[15] + belt8[16] + belt8[17] + belt8[18] + belt8[19] + belt8[20] + belt8[21] + belt8[22] + belt8[23] + belt8[24] + belt8[25] + belt8[26] + belt8[27] + belt8[28] + belt8[29] + belt8[30] + belt8[31] + belt8[32] + belt8[33] + belt8[34] + belt8[35] + belt5[0] + belt5[1] + belt5[2] + belt5[3] + belt5[4] + belt5[5] + belt5[6] + belt5[7] + belt5[8] + belt5[9] + belt5[10] + belt5[11] + belt5[12] + belt5[13] + belt3[0] + belt3[1] + belt3[2] + belt3[3] + belt3[4] + belt3[5] + belt3[6] + belt3[7] + belt4[0] + belt4[1] + belt4[2] + belt4[3] + belt4[4] + belt4[5] + belt4[6] + belt4[7] + belt4[8]) == 12 )

query.comment: All empty and waiting stations will eventually process a piece:

query.formula: (stationBusy[0] == 0 and processingStation1.WAITING and !getPiece(1,getStationPos(1))) --> (stationBusy[0] == 1 and processingStation1.PROCESSING and getPiece(1,getStationPos(1)))
(stationBusy[1] == 0 and processingStation2.WAITING and !getPiece(2,getStationPos(2))) --> (stationBusy[1] == 1 and processingStation2.PROCESSING and getPiece(2,getStationPos(2)))
(stationBusy[2] == 0 and processingStation3.WAITING and !getPiece(3,getStationPos(3))) --> (stationBusy[2] == 1 and processingStation3.PROCESSING and getPiece(3,getStationPos(3)))
(stationBusy[3] == 0 and processingStation4.WAITING and !getPiece(4,getStationPos(4))) --> (stationBusy[3] == 1 and processingStation4.PROCESSING and getPiece(4,getStationPos(4)))
(stationBusy[4] == 0 and processingStation5.WAITING and !getPiece(5,getStationPos(5))) --> (stationBusy[4] == 1 and processingStation5.PROCESSING and getPiece(5,getStationPos(5)))
(stationBusy[5] == 0 and processingStation6.WAITING and !getPiece(6,getStationPos(6))) --> (stationBusy[5] == 1 and processingStation6.PROCESSING and getPiece(6,getStationPos(6)))

query.comment: All stations that are processing a piece will eventually release it:

query.formula: (stationBusy[0] == 1 and processingStation1.PROCESSING and getPiece(1,getStationPos(1))) --> (stationBusy[0] == 0 and processingStation1.WAITING and !getPiece(1,getStationPos(1)))
(stationBusy[1] == 1 and processingStation2.PROCESSING and getPiece(2,getStationPos(2))) --> (stationBusy[1] == 0 and processingStation2.WAITING and !getPiece(2,getStationPos(2)))
(stationBusy[2] == 1 and processingStation3.PROCESSING and getPiece(3,getStationPos(3))) --> (stationBusy[2] == 0 and processingStation3.WAITING and !getPiece(3,getStationPos(3)))
(stationBusy[3] == 1 and processingStation4.PROCESSING and getPiece(4,getStationPos(4))) --> (stationBusy[3] == 0 and processingStation4.WAITING and !getPiece(4,getStationPos(4)))
(stationBusy[4] == 1 and processingStation5.PROCESSING and getPiece(5,getStationPos(5))) --> (stationBusy[4] == 0 and processingStation5.WAITING and !getPiece(5,getStationPos(5)))
(stationBusy[5] == 1 and processingStation6.PROCESSING and getPiece(6,getStationPos(6))) --> (stationBusy[5] == 0 and processingStation6.WAITING and !getPiece(6,getStationPos(6)))

query.formula: Pr[<=TAU] ([] !( stationBusy[0] and stationBusy[1] and stationBusy[2] and stationBusy[3] and stationBusy[4] and stationBusy[5] and ( (belt6[1] == 1) and (belt6[2] == 1) and (belt6[3] == 1) and (belt6[4] == 1) and (belt6[5] == 1) and (belt6[6] == 1) and (belt6[7] == 1) and (belt6[8] == 1) and (belt6[9] == 1) and (belt6[10] == 1) and (belt6[11] == 1) and (belt6[12] == 1) ) and ( (belt7[1] == 1) and (belt7[2] == 1) and (belt7[3] == 1) and (belt7[4] == 1) and (belt7[5] == 1) and (belt7[6] == 1) and (belt7[7] == 1) and (belt7[8] == 1) and (belt7[9] == 1) and (belt7[10] == 1) and (belt7[11] == 1) ) and ( (belt8[0] == 1) and (belt8[1] == 1) and (belt8[2] == 1) and (belt8[3] == 1) and (belt8[4] == 1) and (belt8[5] == 1) and (belt8[6] == 1) and (belt8[7] == 1) and (belt8[8] == 1) and (belt8[9] == 1) ) and ( (belt5[1] == 1) and (belt5[2] == 1) and (belt5[3] == 1) ) and ( (belt3[0] == 1) and (belt3[1] == 1) and (belt3[2] == 1) and (belt3[3] == 1) ) ) )
query.comment: Scenario 1-2: The plant never incurs in deadlock.

query.formula: Pr[<=TAU] ([] !( stationBusy[0] and stationBusy[1] and stationBusy[2] and stationBusy[3] and stationBusy[4] and stationBusy[5] and (belt6[1] == 1) and (belt7[1] == 1) and (belt8[0] == 1) and (belt5[1] == 1) and (belt3[0] == 1) ) )
query.comment: Scenario 3: The plant never incurs in deadlock.
The production plant never has duplicate or missing pieces (12 pieces):

query.formula: Pr[<=TAU] ([] ( (!conveyorBelt1.DOING_STEP and !conveyorBelt2.DOING_STEP and !conveyorBelt3.DOING_STEP and !conveyorBelt4.DOING_STEP and !conveyorBelt5.DOING_STEP and !conveyorBelt6.DOING_STEP and !conveyorBelt7.DOING_STEP and !conveyorBelt8.DOING_STEP) imply (belt6[0] + belt6[1] + belt6[2] + belt6[3] + belt6[4] + belt6[5] + belt6[6] + belt6[7] + belt6[8] + belt6[9] + belt6[10] + belt6[11] + belt6[12] + belt6[13] + belt6[14] + belt6[15] + belt6[16] + belt1[0] + belt1[1] + belt1[2] + belt1[3] + belt1[4] + belt1[5] + belt7[0] + belt7[1] + belt7[2] + belt7[3] + belt7[4] + belt7[5] + belt7[6] + belt7[7] + belt7[8] + belt7[9] + belt7[10] + belt7[11] + belt7[12] + belt7[13] + belt7[14] + belt2[0] + belt2[1] + belt2[2] + belt2[3] + belt2[4] + belt2[5] + belt8[0] + belt8[1] + belt8[2] + belt8[3] + belt8[4] + belt8[5] + belt8[6] + belt8[7] + belt8[8] + belt8[9] + belt8[10] + belt8[11] + belt8[12] + belt8[13] + belt8[14] + belt8[15] + belt8[16] + belt8[17] + belt8[18] + belt8[19] + belt8[20] + belt8[21] + belt8[22] + belt8[23] + belt8[24] + belt8[25] + belt8[26] + belt8[27] + belt8[28] + belt8[29] + belt8[30] + belt8[31] + belt8[32] + belt8[33] + belt8[34] + belt8[35] + belt5[0] + belt5[1] + belt5[2] + belt5[3] + belt5[4] + belt5[5] + belt5[6] + belt5[7] + belt5[8] + belt5[9] + belt5[10] + belt5[11] + belt5[12] + belt5[13] + belt3[0] + belt3[1] + belt3[2] + belt3[3] + belt3[4] + belt3[5] + belt3[6] + belt3[7] + belt4[0] + belt4[1] + belt4[2] + belt4[3] + belt4[4] + belt4[5] + belt4[6] + belt4[7] + belt4[8]) == 12 ))

query.comment: Eventually all belts will receive at least 1 piece:

query.formula: Pr[<=TAU] (<> ((belt6[0] + belt6[1] + belt6[2] + belt6[3] + belt6[4] + belt6[5] + belt6[6] + belt6[7] + belt6[8] + belt6[9] + belt6[10] + belt6[11] + belt6[12] + belt6[13] + belt6[14] + belt6[15] + belt6[16]) >= 1))
